content: this crochet knot bag pattern is the perfect size for a small handbag to carry your essentials around town it can also be used as a small project bag as you can easily fit inside a pair of socks or some granny squares this pdf includes one size for a bag of 23x20 cm without the handles you will need worsted weight yarn and a j/6 0 mm crochet hook inside the pdf you will find a print-friendly version if you like working from a print copy check before printing
